name: Luna, Vampire Slayer

Luna, Vampire Slayer

Blast and slash your way to the end

Game Controls

Keyboard support only for the moment

Movement - WASD

Aiming - Mouse

Fire - Left Click

Slash - Right Click

Restart - R

Quit - ESC

How to play

Luna, Vampire Slayer, is a resource management bullet hell. 

You have a finite amount of bullets, 20 in total.

The only way to restore bullets is by reflecting enemy projectiles or landing hits with your sword.

Your sword can only be used sparingly, 3 slices in total. Your sword's stamina will recover over time, but it will recover quicker if you land shots with your gun.
